text: Meet Baluyev! () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Victor Komissarjevski.У Московского фестиваля два юбилея. Один из них мы отмечаем сегодняЗНАКОМЬТЕСЬ, БАЛУЕВ It stars Ivan Pereverzev, Nina Urgant, and Stanislav Sokolov. The movie is based on a 1960 novel by Vadim Kozhevnikov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1963 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Meet Baluyev!
